Stunning and Modern Studio- 1 or 2 Bedroom Apartments right in West Broadway in close proximity to the nearby Seaport District and Fort Point Channel. West Square is a ten-minute walk to the MBTA Red Line subway providing easy access to Downtown Boston, UMASS, Cambridge, MIT and Harvard University. With Logan Airport a seven-minute drive away.

Unit features Beautiful Parquet Floors throughout, Hight ceilings, lots of Window Space with Natural Light, Topnotch Modern Bathroom and Eat-In Kitchen with State of the Art Appliances and Cabinetry, Washer/Dryer in unit!!
